ygData.subject: Additional Notes on Research & Langauges
ygData.msgSnippet: Well I thought I had it all finished, I have maxed out my Old Erudian so I can read the Cannon of Wizzadry (which I can), and decided to buy the next book
ygData.messageBody:
Well I thought I had it all finished, I have maxed out my Old Erudian so I
can read the Cannon of Wizzadry (which I can), and decided to buy the next
book Doctorine of Wizzadry thinking I could read it as well. WRONG. It
seems to be written in a new langauge, which is unfortunate because I have a
few languages with just Feeble skill, thus why I can only read part of the
book. If anyone out there knows what language this one is written in, I
would greatly appreciate this info.

Now for new languages, I have been completely trained in Barbarian and
Gnomish last night and half training in Lizardman (I like this one).
Getting Kobold tonight, so if you have a language that you are willing to
trade for one of mine please give me a tell.

Shadair
15th Wizzard of Nerriak
Karana
